name: Cat's Seven Lifes
description:
The cat have seven lives, at back to life the phantasm will do what done in his past life. Get all the 'Stars' at the same time to go to the next level.

A charismatic platformer puzzle with a cute kitten who refuses to die.

CONTROLS

MOVE: A-D or Left-Right Arrow Keys

JUMP : Up Arrow Key, W, J or Spacebar

R: Restart Level
